events.message: The claimant reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of May 10th. They described damage to the front bumper and requested immediate assistance.
Based on the description of vehicle damage and collision details, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident for proper processing.
An experienced claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the case and assist the claimant throughout the process.
The claimant received confirmation that their claim had been successfully recorded and acknowledged by the insurance company.
The claimant was requested to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle and a police accident report within the next five days.
All required documents including images of damages and the official accident report were submitted on time by the claimant.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted materials and contacted the claimant for additional clarifications regarding the vehicle condition.
After thorough review, investigators confirmed the collision details matched the submitted documents and the claim is valid.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and a rental vehicle for two weeks was proposed to the claimant for approval.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and appreciated the clear communication from the agent.
Management approved the settlement amount after reviewing the investigation report and customer feedback.
The approved payment was transferred to the claimant's account covering all agreed expenses related to the accident claim.
The claim was formally closed after confirming that the claimant received payment and acknowledged satisfaction with the resolution.
All claim documents and communications were securely archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
